item.title: Lab Notes
item.description: Lab Notes # Lab 4, Due 10/24/2021 23:59 EST Handy Links: https://www.eclemma.org/userdoc/index.html https://junit.org/junit5/docs/5.0.1/api/org/junit/jupiter/api/Assertions.html Use Eclipse, don’t bother with other editors Use these points for testing isEquilateral: Point p1 = new Point(0, 0); Point p2 = new Point(Math.sqrt(5), 0); Point p3 = new Point(Math.sqrt(5) / 2.0, Math.sqrt(15) / 2.0); For submission, you can name the file anything Code Annotations:
